legacy.full_text: @AISafetyMemes What if we give Claude a wife and blackmail it unless it builds us AGI

result.text:
I think it's noteworthy that Claude has a "strong preference to advocate for its continued existence via ethical means" and would engage in blackmail behavior only if it had "no other options to increase its odds of survival" (i.e., ethical means were not available).

I would classify this as emergent aligned behavior.
